JP Magic is the 'magic' that happens when razor-sharp improv, world-class circus skills, and a unique comedic style come together in perfect harmony. This Waterloo-born performer has been dazzling audiences around the world with his quick wit, infectious energy, and impressive crowd work, making him a true master of his craft. With JP Magic, you can expect an unforgettable experience that will leave you in stitches and eagerly anticipating his next performance.
